events.name: DEF CON 33 (2025)
events.description: Join us at the world's largest hacker convention where Red Team Village will host workshops, capture the flag competitions, more!

sponsors.name: Flare
sponsors.description: Flare is the leader in Threat Exposure Management, helping organizations of all sizes detect high-risk exposures found on the clear and dark web. Combining the industry's best cybercrime database with a ridiculously intuitive user experience, Flare enables customers to reclaim the information advantage and get ahead of threat actors. For more information, visit https://flare.io

sponsors.name: Altered Security
sponsors.description: Start your Red Team training journey Altered Security! Altered Security offers multiple on-prem Red Team and Azure Red Team courses with affordable and enterprise-like hands-on labs. We are the creators of the popular Red Team certifications - CRTP, CRTE and CARTP. Join more than 40K professionals from 130+ countries.

sponsors.name: HackingHub
sponsors.description: Learn to hack, for the real world.

sponsors.name: HAKAI
sponsors.description: Hakai Security is a cybersecurity consulting firm operating within a comprehensive ecosystem focused on real-world offensive security. We deliver specialized services in Red Team operations, penetration testing, DevSecOps, and Attack Surface Management (ASM) - QuimeraX. Alongside our consulting services, we run an educational platform designed to advance offensive security education (Hacking Club), offering hands-on learning experiences that reflect real-world challenges faced by security professionals.

sponsors.name: Synack Red Team
sponsors.description: The Synack Red Team is more than a bug bounty platform.  It represents a trusted global community of highly-skilled security researchers tasked with helping secure some of the world's most notable brands and government agencies.  Be curious, get paid for doing what you love, and find your hacker home!

sponsors.name: ThreatSims
sponsors.description: ThreatSims transforms cybersecurity simulations into practical skills through immersive, hands-on learning experiences. As a comprehensive training platform trusted by leading organizations, ThreatSims has served over 15,000 participants across 40+ events, delivering 2,100+ specialized modules that prepare professionals for real-world cybersecurity challenges.

sponsors.name: Risk3Sixty
sponsors.description: Risk3sixty empowers security and GRC leaders with elite consulting, a powerful GRC platform, and proven playbooks. The company is trusted by top organizations and recognized for innovation, execution, and a culture that attracts top industry talent.

sponsors.name: Optiv
sponsors.description: Optiv is the cyber advisory and solutions leader, delivering strategic and technical expertise that allows you to secure your full potential. We advise, deploy and operate complete cybersecurity programs from strategy and managed security services to risk, integration and technology solutions.

sponsors.name: The SecOps Group
sponsors.description: PentestingExams.com by The SecOps Group is a platform offering practical, scenario-based penetration testing exams across a wide range of domains—including web, mobile (Android & iOS), cloud, network, Active Directory, blockchain, and AI/ML. Each exam is designed to test real-world offensive security skills, helping professionals stay sharp and relevant in an evolving threat landscape. Our mission is to raise the bar for hands-on pentesting expertise and support the global security community through rigorous, accessible certifications.

sponsors.name: Maltek Solutions
sponsors.description:
At Maltek Solutions, we are driven by an unwavering passion for cybersecurity. Our mission is to provide the best possible security solutions tailored to each customers unique needs. We believe in transparency, fairness, and equitable treatment for our team, which fosters an environment that enhances our ability to deliver top-notch services. 

By collaborating closely with our customers at every step, we ensure solutions that not only meet their security requirements but also align with their budget constraints. Our holistic approach, engaging both executive decision-makers and frontline security teams, allows us to understand and address the diverse aspects of our customers’ security posture
